title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 § 5007.4 - Ticket price
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 § 5007.4 - Ticket price

State Regulations
(a) Price. Mega

Millions bet tickets may be purchased for $5 per play at the discretion of the
purchaser, in accordance with the number of plays and drawings selected. The
purchaser receives one play for each $5 wagered in Mega Millions. A Mega

Millions bet ticket may contain multiple plays. The commission may authorize
the sale of Mega Millions bet tickets at a lesser purchase price for
promotional purposes. Such a change in the purchase price shall be announced
publicly by the commission prior to the effective date of such
change. (b) From time to time, the
commission may authorize the sale of Mega Millions tickets at a discount for
promotional purposes. (c) A Mega

Millions game feature may be added at the discretion of the commission. A game
feature is an alternative or additional method for playing the game within the
same basic design. Notes
